thread.title: Patricia Snyder
thread.title_full: Costa Rican Vacations reviewed by Patricia Snyder

author: Patricia Snyder
title: Patricia Snyder
text: Caitlyn Rowlands planned our Costa Rican vacation from start to finish. We were very pleased with our accommodations at The Tabacon in La Fortuna and Cala Luna in Tamarindo. She also recommended several activities which exceeded our expectations! The transportation to and from all of the activities was also taken care of. You won't be disappointed if you trust Caitlyn with your vacation planning. Happy Travels!
